concept.title: Cosmic Tic-Tac-Toe: Stellar Showdown
concept.description: Embark on an interstellar journey where classic Tic-Tac-Toe meets strategic cosmic combat. Defend your celestial grid from alien invaders by strategically placing your stars (X) and galaxies (O) to achieve victory.
concept.objective: To win rounds of Tic-Tac-Toe by completing a line of three of your symbols (stars or galaxies) before the opponent does, while simultaneously fending off encroaching alien threats.
mechanics: Grid-based placement: Players place their symbols on a 3x3 grid.
Symbol switching: Players can choose to play as 'Stars' (X) or 'Galaxies' (O) before each round, influencing their symbol and potential power-up effects.
Alien interference: Periodic waves of alien ships appear on the grid, blocking spaces or attempting to destroy placed symbols.
player_abilities: Strategic Placement: The fundamental ability to place your chosen symbol on an available grid space.
Symbol Shift: Ability to swap your symbol between 'Stars' and 'Galaxies' between rounds to adapt to enemy patterns or power-up availability.
Cosmic Shield: A temporary defensive ability that prevents a single alien ship from interfering with a chosen grid space for one turn.

enemies.name: Nebula Swarmer
enemies.behavior: Randomly moves across the grid and attempts to occupy an empty space. If an occupied space is chosen, it can attempt to corrupt the symbol (temporarily disabling it).

enemies.name: Comet Raider
enemies.behavior: Targets specific grid lines (rows, columns, diagonals) and attempts to block them with its trajectory. If a line is not completed by the player, the Raider can destroy a player's symbol on that line.

enemies.name: Black Hole Blob
enemies.behavior: Slowly expands to cover adjacent grid spaces, making them unplayable. It's the most persistent threat, requiring strategic placement to circumvent its growth.

powerups.name: Nova Burst (Star Powerup)
powerups.effect: If playing as 'Stars', allows you to instantly clear an occupied space by an alien ship or an opponent's symbol.

powerups.name: Gravitational Pull (Galaxy Powerup)
powerups.effect: If playing as 'Galaxies', allows you to swap the position of two of your already placed symbols on the grid.

powerups.name: Wormhole Warp
powerups.effect: Allows you to immediately place your next symbol on any unoccupied space on the grid, bypassing alien interference or strategic blocking.

concept.level_progression: Each 'level' is a match against an AI opponent with increasing difficulty. Levels also introduce new alien types and more aggressive alien waves. Winning multiple rounds consecutively unlocks new visual themes and more powerful alien behaviors.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for winning a round of Tic-Tac-Toe. Bonus points are given for winning with a 'clean sweep' (no alien interference on the winning line), or for successfully utilizing power-ups. Losing a round to an alien interference incurs a penalty.
concept.visual_style: A blend of vibrant, abstract cosmic backgrounds with sharp, retro-futuristic UI elements. Grid lines are represented by glowing energy pathways. Player symbols (stars and galaxies) are stylized and animated. Alien ships are reminiscent of classic arcade invaders with a cosmic flair.
concept.sound_theme: A dynamic soundtrack that shifts between ambient, ethereal cosmic tunes during calm moments and upbeat, retro-synthwave tracks during intense alien encounters. Sound effects are crisp and futuristic, with satisfying clicks for symbol placement and impactful explosions for alien destruction.

level_design.description: Welcome to your first cosmic challenge! Learn the basics of Stellar Showdown by navigating through a peaceful nebula, gathering resources, and fending off some early alien scouts. Your strategic placement on the 3x3 grid is key!
